name: Burn (itch) (irwatts)
description:
Created in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 36.

You got some fire, and some plants ready to combust. They might be a danger to the nearby village in the future, so you should go ahead and do a controlled burn now.

The fire spreads faster as more plants catch on fire, so getting enough clumps ablaze is required to truly make progress.

Controls:
(Best played with mouse and keyboard, but gamepad works outside of menus)

Move
WASD / Gamepad Left Stick

Lower torch
Mouse Left Click / Gamepad Right Trigger

Jump
Space / Gamepad A

Pause
Esc / P / Gamepad Start
